text-me: Focused on excellence, committed to effectively collaborating in development teams to deliver high-quality solutions.
text-about-me: A passionate technology enthusiast with a focus on web development. Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science at UEPB, with practical experience in web projects. My goal is to create impactful and functional digital experiences that captivate users. I'm excited to share my work and contribute to innovative projects.
text-about-me-short: A technology enthusiast passionate about web development, currently studying Computer Science at UEPB. I'm excited to share my work and contribute to innovative projects.
text-skills: Check out some programming languages, technologies, and methodologies that I have experience with and constantly seek to evolve my knowledge in.
text-projects: Explore my recent projects and discover my work. From dynamic web applications to creative experiments, each project reflects my commitment to quality and innovation. Feel free to explore, learn, and get inspired.
text-projects-short: Explore my recent projects and discover my work. From dynamic applications to creative experiments. Feel free to explore, learn, and get inspired.
text-contact: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have a project in mind, want to work together, or just want to say hello, feel free to contact me.
